Class Advertiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Responder
      • Advertiser

  • public class Advertiser
extends Responder

    Java Dating Program Advertiser Class

    Advertiser class manages customers that are available as matches to objects of the Resonder class. It is also the child of the Advertiser class.
    Since:
    25-02-2018
